mapper.update: update mooc_order_t set order_status = 1 where uuid = #{orderId}
mapper.select: select o.UUID as orderId, f.film_name as filmName, fd.begin_time as fieldTime, c.cinema_name as cinemaName, o.seats_name as seatsName, o.order_price as orderPrice, o.order_status as orderStatus, o.order_time as orderTimestamp from mooc_order_t o LEFT JOIN mtime_field_t fd on o.field_id = fd.UUID LEFT JOIN mtime_film_t f on o.film_id = f.UUID LEFT JOIN mtime_cinema_t c on o.cinema_id = c.UUID where o.order_user = #{userId}
